title: shrI subrahmaNyO mAm rakSatu
sahitya:
shrI subrahmaNyo mAm rakShatu ShaNmukhAvatAraha shaktirUpaha


anupallavi

  bhAsamAna vallidevasenO bhAratIshAdi tatvabodhanO
vAsavAdi vandita shubha caraNO patravibhUti pradAna nipuNaha


caraNam    shatakoti bhAskara shObhAkaraha shiShTa shitikaNTAtmaja shivakaraha
pratApa tArakAdi hatadhIraha prabala gaNeshAnuja ShaDaksharaha
shatAyuhu prada bhakta mandAraha shankAbhiShekAt upacAraha
kShitisha pUjita divyAmbaraha nava vIrAnanda vara guruguhaha
